tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GroupActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    group_id INT,
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES AdvocacyGroups(group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE group_policy_relationship (
   relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   group_id INT,
   issue_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES advocacy_group(group_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES policy_issues(issue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE outcome_relationship (
   relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   outcome_id INT,
   issue_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (outcome_id) REFERENCES legislative_outcomes(outcome_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES policy_issues(issue_id)
);
